name: UXfolio Case Study Template
description:
Design your case studies with the specialized structure of UXfolio and the fluidity of Figma at your disposal.


This template uses Figma Auto Layout & Variants to recreate UXfolio’s layouts and customization options so you can quickly experiment with your document design without worrying about feasibility.


By designing in Figma prior to publishing, you gain access to the following functionality currently not available on the UXfolio site, including:

  • Using zoom to get a bird’s eye view of your whole case study
  • Placing screencaps of other case studies next to yours for reference
  • An extensive undo history and version control
  • Directly dragging content sections up and down in your document draft
  • Toggling the visibility of content sections without deleting them
  • Adjusting image fill & cropping within the context of your document (and exporting adjusted images as assets for the live site)


In addition to these Figma features, this template also provides:

  • Text-based placeholders for you to jot down image ideas
  • A “Draft” effect to help distinguish working vs final content
  • Customizable image container templates
  • Tips and walkthroughs to help with functionality based on Auto Layout & Variants


Hope you enjoy this template!
